title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 July 2013 - XWiki
content:
<altker128> has joined #xwiki  
01:32 <altker128> I'm trying to make use of the box macro and I just want continuous lines of text with the entire box formatted with an indent...but I notice the box macro itself can contain wiki syntax.  Is there any easy way to accomplish what I want?
